titleStmt.title: Some select queries humbly offered to the consideration of the D--- of C--t--b--y

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Refers to John Tillotson, dean, and later archbishop, of Canterbury -- Cf. DNB, and John Wilkins' "Sermons preached on several occasions", pub. London, 1682 (OCLC #23636676).
Item at 1732:18 is incorrectly identified as Wing S4611 in reel guide.
Reproduction of originals in Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (reel 1732) and Christ Church (University of Oxford). Library (reel 2678).
